about_the_game:
Game Introduction:
Unlock a variety of delectable foods by checking into different locations. You can enjoy a meal of delicious food while watching the scenery.
Build your own farm, Experience the joy of growing and harvesting by planting various crops, fruits, and vegetables.
Embark on adventures to challenge the mushroom elves in the forest, discovering an array of treasures and recipes.
Work part-time in different scenes, and upgrade skills.
detailed_description:
Game Introduction:
Unlock a variety of delectable foods by checking into different locations. You can enjoy a meal of delicious food while watching the scenery.
Build your own farm, Experience the joy of growing and harvesting by planting various crops, fruits, and vegetables.
Embark on adventures to challenge the mushroom elves in the forest, discovering an array of treasures and recipes.
Work part-time in different scenes, and upgrade skills.
name: Foodie novice village

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: win7/win10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Set up your own farm, venture into the forest, find precious recipes and ingredients, enjoy the food you grow, and taste different foods in different scenes.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
